H0.text: Who was the next British Prime Minister after Arthur Balfour. Winston Churchill

H1.text: Who was the next British Prime Minister after Arthur Balfour. David Lloyd George

H2.text: Who was the next British Prime Minister after Arthur Balfour. Herbert Henry Asquith

H3.text: Who was the next British Prime Minister after Arthur Balfour. Campbell-Bannerman

A4.text: Arthur Balfour resigned as prime minister, prompting Edward VII to invite Campbell‑Bannerman to form a minority government.

A5.text: Campbell‑Bannerman resigned as prime minister in April 1908 due to ill‑health and was replaced by his chancellor, H. H. Asquith.
